website_summaries.verdict: The ones to pick if your top concern in selecting ski socks is keeping your feet dry – but keep in mind that going down in size may provide a better fit.
pros: Waterproof material blend that offers a combination of warmth and flexibility
Cushioned yet lightweight enough for a comfortable fit in a variety of boots
More available styles than most brands
cons: The waterproof material feels strange at first, but the upside is how dry they keep your feet
Shorter than others on our list, and sizes run large

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My son hikes all the time and so we ordered these for him. I was skeptical but figured what the heck. My son wore them on a snow shoeing trip. He didn't wear them on the first day and his feet got a little damp and cold. The second day he put these on over some dry socks and they worked as advertised. His feet stayed dry and he got warmer since his feet were not wet. We're going to order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You like dry feet? Buy them now!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as he works outdoors in Eastern Washington. We get some really rainy days and definitely snow. He LOVES these socks and thinks everyone should own them! They are definitely waterproof, super cozy, stylish and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: AliciaRyan

customer_reviews.title: He tried them out when skiing and liked them. The real test will be snowmobiling
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my son. He tried them out when skiing and liked them. The real test will be snowmobiling, which won't be for a few weeks yet.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking and dry feet
customer_reviews.text: These really did help going through alaska and layering them with a good boot really made the difference. I think with washes the waterproofing went away, but still a good sock
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D.

customer_reviews.title: Good for walking on wet dock - rowing
customer_reviews.text: I use these with rowing so my feet don't get wet when walking on the dock. SO much better than regular socks!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Martin

customer_reviews.title: I gave a it as a gift to my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave a it as a gift to my husband and he loves it. he even uses it to go riding on his dirtbike
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Good tub shoes
customer_reviews.text: They wear quick and become not waterproof within a week of active use. If you walk in tubs they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: These are just awesome. Tired of wet socks when walking dog in ...
customer_reviews.text: These are just awesome.Tired of wet socks when walking dog in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: john kearney

customer_reviews.title: ... my feet sweat on the hike and were quite comfortable. I went by the sizing chart and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to actually step in a puddle or wet my feet in these but they didn't make my feet sweat on the hike and were quite comfortable. I went by the sizing chart and the socks are a little big for my feet. I end up wearing a second pair of short socks under them for extra warmth in the winter. My boyfriend seemed to like the second pair. I am not sure yet if by washing them in the washing machine with Tide has ruined them but that should be tested soon enough. I wear a woman's 9 1/2 and ordered the Mediums for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle L

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, breathable and have the cushion I was after
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, breathable and have the cushion I was after. Was a lil leary when I had them in my hand,thought they were going to be like a neophren sock,but they are sooo much more. Can't make em better.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Nelson

customer_reviews.title: looks good to be waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of slippery inside out. Otherwise, looks good to be waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Claud

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my new pair of socks !!fit as i espected :] my feet dont get wet💧💧💧
customer_reviews.author: JORGE HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Awesome is the word for these socks. I have paid full price for 2 sets of these socks. They are perfect for my husband and son for Boy Scout hikes and skiing. Feet stay completely dry. Socks are comfortable. What more is needed?
customer_reviews.author: SherylinRI

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits ok, haven't tried it in really rainy weather yet.
customer_reviews.author: martyn601

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received but haven't used yet. Feels thick and warm. Will have to update review once socks are actually worn.
customer_reviews.author: Ka Thor

customer_reviews.title: So Far I like it. I heard from other friends of mine ...
customer_reviews.text: So Far I like it. I heard from other friends of mine who used it earlier than me mention that after couple of washes, the waterproof capability fades away. I have to test it myself and will update my review then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Waterproof Socks, RANDY SUN Men's Socks-The Best Socks For Trail Running Obstacles Courses
product_meta.description:
ABOUT OUR WATERPROOF SOCKS:
RANDY SUN’s Unisex Waterproof Socks is a new patented product that has been certified by SGS corporation.
Due to its favorable durability and high air permeability, our waterproof socks has become one of the top choices for outdoor enthusiasts, military personnel as well as postal clerks.

FEATURES:
1)The three-layer knitting construction design handily solves the contradiction between waterproofing and breathing property.
2)It will keep your feet cool and dry all day long and fit for all seasons.
3)Soft Cushion & Seamless Toe: The reinforced heel and seamless toe ensure the long-lasting comfort and avoid yarn chaffing and irritation.
4)100% waterproof and breathable, warm and comfortable, 100% seamless, perfect fit on the feet.

WEIGHT:
Each pair of the Mid-Calf socks(Size M) weighs 3.42 ounces;
Each pair of the Ankle socks(Size M) weighs 2.47 ounces.

PACKAGE:
One pair of socks per package.

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE:
Best Products and Service!
If our items do not perform to your satisfaction, return it to us within 30 DAYS along with your proof of purchase for a hassle-free full refund.
Feel free to contact us via email with any comments and suggestions, or for any questions like sizes, delivery, discount, return or exchange items, etc.
We will try our best to solve your problems and promise you a nice shopping experience.

Wish you a good time shopping here!
feature_bullets: Outer: 61% high waterproof nylon, 32% polyester, 7% elastane;Interlayer: a high performance lightweight function of waterproof and breathable membrane, Lining: 66% coolmax, 30% polyester,4% elastane

FOUR SIZES: Extra Small Size - fit for US men 5-7 and US women 6-8; Small Size - fit for US men 7.5-9.5 and US women 8.5-11; Medium Size - fit for US men 10-12.5 and US women 11.5-13.5; Large Size - fit for US men 13-15 and US women 14-16. Please refer to images on the left for more detailed size information.
Daily Wear,foot care,especially suitable for outdoor sports and activities of various kind of harsh environments
Keep your feet dry and health.
Ultra-light cushion sole provides comfort and great fit,suitable for biking,walking and running during warmer seasons when there is a need to keep dry feet
Hand wash under normal temperature,water temperature should be below 40 degree centigrade if machine wash, do not iron, dry clean or tumble dry but hang to dry after spin-dry in ventilated place
